mapper.insert:
insert into sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION
RES_NO,
RES_TYPE,
"CHECK IN_TIME",
CHECKED_OUT_TIME,
RES_PERSON_ORG_ID,
RES_PERSON_ID,
RES_ORG_ID,
RES_STATUS,
SCHEDULE_ID,
CASE_CODE,
PROPERTY_ADDRESS,
SIGNING_CENTER,
NUMBER_OF_PARTICIPANTS,
TRANSACT_ITEM_CODE,
SPECIAL_REQUIREMENT,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_BY,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_BY,
#{resNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{checkInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{checkedOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{resPersonOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resPersonId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{resOrgId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{resStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{propertyAddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{signingCenter,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{numberOfParticipants,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{transactItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specialRequirement,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CODE = (select YU_TEAM_CODE from sctrans_dev.sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE_TARGET where GRP_CODE = #{grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
SELECT CODE AS code,NAME AS name FROM sctrans.SYS_DICT WHERE TYPE = 'transactItem' AND PARENT_ID != '';

SELECT rs.PKID AS scheduleId,rs.ROOM_ID AS roomId,sr.ROOM_NO AS roomNo,sr.ORG_ID AS orgId,sr.NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE AS numberOfPeople,rs.START_DATE AS startDate,rs.END_DATE AS endDate FROM sctrans.T_RM_SIGN_ROOM sr LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE rs ON rs.ROOM_ID = sr.PKID where sr.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sr.NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE >= #{numberOfParticipants,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sr.ROOM_STATUS = '1' AND sr.IS_DELETE = 0 AND rs.START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rs.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rs.CAN_RES = 1 AND rs.USE_STATUS = 'N' AND rs.IS_DELETE = 0 ORDER BY sr.NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH next 1 ROWS ONLY;
mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET RES_ORG_ID = #{resOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},SIGNING_CENTER = #{signingCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
